description: Connect and engage with communities worldwide through social platforms

sections.title: Social Media
sections.description: Major social media platforms for sharing and connecting

platforms.name: Twitter
platforms.description: Microblogging platform for real-time news, thoughts, and conversations

platforms.name: Facebook
platforms.description: World's largest social networking platform connecting friends and family

platforms.name: Instagram
platforms.description: Photo and video sharing platform with stories and reels

platforms.name: TikTok
platforms.description: Short-form video platform for creative content and entertainment

platforms.name: YouTube
platforms.description: Video sharing platform for creators, education, and entertainment

platforms.name: Snapchat
platforms.description: Multimedia messaging app with disappearing messages and AR filters

platforms.name: Pinterest
platforms.description: Visual discovery platform for ideas, inspiration, and planning

platforms.name: Twitch
platforms.description: Live streaming platform primarily for gaming and creative content

platforms.name: Mastodon
platforms.description: Decentralized social network with privacy and freedom focus

platforms.name: BlueSky
platforms.description: Decentralized social media protocol and app

platforms.name: Threads
platforms.description: Text-based conversation app by Instagram

sections.description: Career-focused platforms for networking and opportunities

platforms.name: LinkedIn
platforms.description: Professional networking platform for career growth and business connections

platforms.name: AngelList

platforms.description: Creative portfolio platform for designers and artists

platforms.description: Community of designers showcasing their work and finding opportunities

platforms.name: GitHub

platforms.description: Question and answer community for programmers and developers

platforms.name: Product Hunt
platforms.description: Community for discovering and launching new products

platforms.name: Indie Hackers
platforms.description: Community of entrepreneurs building profitable online businesses

platforms.name: DeviantArt
platforms.description: Online community for artists to showcase and discover digital art

platforms.name: Upwork
platforms.description: Freelancing platform connecting professionals with businesses

platforms.name: Reddit

platforms.name: Hacker News
platforms.description: Social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship

platforms.name: Quora
platforms.description: Question and answer platform where people share knowledge

platforms.name: 4chan
platforms.description: Anonymous imageboard for discussing various topics

platforms.name: Lobste.rs
platforms.description: Technology-focused community with high-quality discussions

platforms.name: Designer News
platforms.description: Community for design professionals to share and discuss

platforms.name: Polywork
platforms.description: Professional network highlighting side projects and interests

platforms.name: Clubhouse

platforms.name: Slack
platforms.description: Business communication platform for teams and organizations

platforms.name: Telegram

platforms.name: WhatsApp

platforms.name: Microsoft Teams
